infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to the camera to take photos and record videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to the microphone to record audio with videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to the photo library to save photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos and videos to your photo library.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos and record videos.
plugins.microphonePermissionText: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to record audio with videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to save captured images and videos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos and videos to your photo library.
